abstract: America Móvil is hoping to buy full control of its former parent, Telmex, in a bid to consolidate Carlos Slim Helú’s vast telecommunications holdings.
snippet: America Móvil is hoping to buy full control of its former parent, Telmex, in a bid to consolidate Carlos Slim Helú’s vast telecommunications holdings.
lead_paragraph: America Móvil, controlled by Carlos Slim Helú, bid on Monday for the 40 percent of its former parent, Telmex, that it does not already own, aiming to consolidate the Mexican billionaire’s telecommunications holdings.

headline.main: Carlos Slim Offers to Buy Full Control of Telmex

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Telefonos de Mexico SAB de CV

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
